event.title: べりーらーじでーたべーす！（VLDB2013論文読み合わせ）
event.catch: DB・分散システムのResearch/Industry限定
event.description:
今年のVLDB2013（http://www.vldb.org/2013/）の論文読み合わせしたいひと募集中：
日程・場所・時間は調整中
↓とりあえず日程調整してみます
http://densuke.biz/list?cd=RAF7uDSe9Fq26HW7

候補論文（VLDB13で関係あるっぽいものを抽出、今年開催であれば他の論文でも良いかもしれない）

// Research
- Revisiting Co-Processing for Hash Joins on the Coupled CPU-GPU Architecture
- Hardware-Oblivious Parallelism for In-Memory Column-Stores
- Improving Flash Write Performance by Using Update Frequency
- Hybrid Storage Management for Database Systems
- The Yin and Yang of Processing Data Warehousing Queries on GPU Devices
- A Performance Study of Three Disk-based Structures for Indexing and Querying Frequent Itemsets
- LLAMA: A Cache/Storage Subsystem for Modern Hardware
- DAX: A Widely Distributed Multi-tenant Storage Service for DBMS Hosting
- Low-latency multi-datacenter databases using replicated commit
- Distribution-Based Query Scheduling
- Processing Analytical Queries over Encrypted Data
- CorrectDB: SQL Engine with Practical Query Authentication
- Scorpion: Explaining Away Outliers in Aggregate Queries
- ClouDiA: A Deployment Advisor for Public Clouds
- Upper and Lower Bounds on the Cost of a Map-Reduce Computation
- Hadoop’s Adolescence: An analysis of Hadoop usage in scientific workloads
- Sharing Data and Work Across Concurrent Analytical Queries
- Efficient Implementation of Generalized Quantification in Relational Query Languages
- Lightweight Locking For Main Memory Database Systems

// Industrial
- Google, MillWheel: Fault-Tolerant Stream Processing at Internet Scale
- Google, F1: A Distributed SQL Database That Scales
- IBM, DB2 with BLU Acceleration: So Much More than Just a Column Store
- Quantcast, The Quantcast File System
- Google, Online, Asynchronous Schema Change in F1
- Facebook, WOO: A Scalable and Multi-tenant Platform for Continuous Knowledge Base Synthesis
- Oracle, Adaptive and Big Data Scale Parallel Execution in Oracle
- IBM, Next Generation Data Analytics at IBM Research
- SAP, SAP HANA: The Evolution from a Modern Main-Memory Data Platform to an Enterprise Application Platform
- Pivotal, Platform-as-a-Service for Data-enabled Applications
- Facebook, Facebook Data Analytics
- NEC, Odyssey: A MultiStore System for Evolutionary Analytics
- Vertica, Designing Query Optimizers for Big Data problems of the future
- MSR, Microsoft SQL Serverâ€™s Integrated Database Approach for Modern Applications and Hardware
- Google, Google Data 2020 – The next challenges in big data
- MS, Continuous Cloud-Scale Query Optimization and Processing
- Turn, Piranha: Optimizing Short Jobs in Hadoop
- IBM, Making Updates Disk-I/O Friendly Using SSDs
